inclusion.criterion: All women required total abdominal hysterectomy +/- bilateral salpingo-oophorectomy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: for various benign gynaecological diseases in Queen Mary Hospital
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: a known history of neurological disorder
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: a known history of urinary incontinence
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: women who had recurrent urinary tract infections or positive urine culture (>105 colony-forming units of an identified single uro-pathogen per milliliter of urine)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: women for whom a complicated procedure was encountered during the hysterectomy in which case in-dwelling catheter had to be kept post-operatively at the surgeon's decision
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: women who had spinal anaesthesia as the choice of anaesthesia or received patient-controlled analgesia as post-operative pain relief
exclusion.label: not_met
